definition: (of a plant) to produce (fruit or seeds)/Taiwan pr. [jie2]
knot/sturdy/bond/to tie/to bind/to check out (of a hotel)
to construct/to form/to make up/to compose/literary composition/paper mulberry (Broussonetia papyrifera)

sentences.english: During the procedure of warm water cross-linkage, the crystalline construction is adjusting.
sentences.chinese: 在溫水交聯過程中，晶體結構也在進行調整。

sentences.english: This was the first crystal structure of a membrane protein to be determined by Chinese scientists.
sentences.chinese: 這是我國科學家測定的第一個膜蛋白的晶體結構。

sentences.english: The appearance of strong reflection bands in the polarized spectra was explained by the aid of crystal structure.
sentences.chinese: 解釋出現在偏振光譜的強反射帶的援助的晶體結構。

sentences.english: The crystal structures of alkali-earth metal dihydrogen diphthalates have been measured.
sentences.chinese: 測定了鹼土金屬鄰苯二甲酸氫鹽的晶體結構。

sentences.english: And, we knew that if we know the crystal structure we can get the Madelung constant, not a problem.
sentences.chinese: 我們都知道只要有了晶體結構，就能知道馬德隆常數。

sentences.english: Crystal structure was analyzed by wide angle X ray scattering(WAXS).
sentences.chinese: 給出了X射線衍射對ACF氈晶體結構分析結果。

sentences.english: Explain the significance of the high-resolution crystal structure of collagen.
sentences.chinese: 請解釋膠原蛋白的高解析度晶體結構的重要性。

sentences.english: Evidence also implicates the crystal structure as a thermal conductivity barrier.
sentences.chinese: 證據還表明晶體結構作爲導熱性障礙。

sentences.english: Because of its ultra-fine crystal structure and high refractive index, it make color more abundance and satiation .
sentences.chinese: 微細晶體結構特性和高折光率，使色彩更顯豐富飽滿。

sentences.english: The structure was solved by heavy-atom method.
sentences.chinese: 應用重原子法測定了晶體結構。

sentences.english: The carbon atoms then neatly arranged themselves into the crystalline structure of a diamond.
sentences.chinese: 把碳原子排列得非常整齊，而形成晶體結構的鑽石。

sentences.english: We found that its gain were improved by adding the PBG structure.
sentences.chinese: 結果表明，通過添加光子晶體結構能提高天線增益。

sentences.english: It is a kind of white extreme pure super-fine powder with cubic crystal structure.
sentences.chinese: 本產品是一種純白的超細粉末，立方晶體結構。
